meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lynn Honda Richard Mason Emilie Bruchon Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4129.

td.p: Lynn Honda, a bookseller from Honolulu, Hawaii
Richard Mason, a roboticist from Pasadena, California
Emilie Bruchon, an international relations specialist from Arlington, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,001)

tr.td: STARS & CONSTELLATIONS
CONTORTIONISM
CANDY & GUM NAMES
DEAD SEA
PEOPLE
(Alex: "I Dead Sea people." That's kind of cute. Sort of.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: I would love it if each of you came up with a different response and each of you was correct.)
---
(Alex: [To Richard] Roberto Benigni, you\'re right. [**], Costa-Gavras film, was the other one. And the other one, the big winner, [***].)
LynnWhat is The Postman?
$5,600
EmilieWhat is Amélie?
$10,000
RichardWhat is Life Is Beautiful?
$4,000
(1 of) Life is Beautiful>, Z, or Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon')

1 of only 3 movies to be nominated for both Best Picture & Best Foreign Language Film in the same year
Emilie
Richard
Lynn
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $29,600
3rd place: $1,000
Emilie
Richard
Lynn

3 W
(including 1 DD)

27 R
(including 2 DDs),
3 W

9 R,
1 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
